eu.liveandgov.ar.core
Class ARViewFragment

java.lang.Object
  android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      eu.liveandgov.ar.core.ARViewFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, View.OnTouchListener, com.metaio.sdk.MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
public abstract class ARViewFragment
extends Fragment
implements com.metaio.sdk.MetaioSurfaceView.Callback, View.OnTouchListener

This implements AR as a fragment. It is not included in MetaioSDK and it was written by scratch.

Author:
Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).
